content: Anyone know if CiviCRM's Shoreditch theme works in Backdrop? It lists Drupal 7 as required. @Laryn ?
Oh, Shoreditch doesn't work with WordPress? I thought it didn't matter
According to https://civicrm.org/extensions/shoreditch seems like there's nothing stopping it working with WordPress, Joomla but that they haven't tested it. Not sure why not.
It seems like Shoreditch dev is dragging on. I wonder if their initial ambition was too big. They could have figured out how to do it in increments and release each time to core
Their approach means they're now on alpha 33!
